tool_description: Calculates sensitivity coefficients for uncertainty propagation by determining how measurement result changes with respect to each input variable.
error_messages: Array length mismatch: variable_names and nominal_values must have same length.
Invalid calculation method: Use analytical, numerical, or finite_difference.
Step size too large: Numerical differentiation step size should be small (< 0.01).
Singular function: Function not differentiable at nominal values.
Numerical instability: Sensitivity calculation shows numerical instability.
Zero sensitivity detected: One or more variables have zero influence on result.
usage: Input measurement function, variable names and values. Tool calculates partial derivatives representing sensitivity of result to each input variable.

sensitivity_coefficients.description: Sensitivity coefficient for each input variable
